A tale of a dog who could sense danger, even if no one else could hear it.
An adventure follows a group of people who try to figure out why the family dog, who never barked, saved them from harm.
The story of a shy dog who didn't bark, but was always there to protect its owner anyway.
A mystery unfolds when a dog suddenly starts barking, after years of never barking a sound.
A story that follows a dog who, despite never barking, managed to find its way back home after being lost.
